titles.title: For the relief of the heirs and assigns of Hattie Davis Rogers of the Nez Perce Indian Reservation, Idaho.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to the heirs and assigns of a named individual in satisfaction of all claims of such individual's estate and heirs and assigns against the United States.
